org.sd.cluster.job
Class WorkServerClientWithOutputJob

java.lang.Object
  org.sd.cluster.job.AbstractJob
      org.sd.cluster.job.OldAbstractJob
          org.sd.cluster.job.WorkServerClientJob
              org.sd.cluster.job.WorkServerClientWithOutputJob
All Implemented Interfaces:
Clusterable, Message, Job, Publishable
public abstract class WorkServerClientWithOutputJob
extends WorkServerClientJob

Base class for work server client jobs with output.

Manages the dataDirName and outputFile.

Author:
Spence Koehler
